Its an unbelievable, awesome, fantastic movie that i had ever seen. Everyone should go and see this movie,they will love it.
Now the countdown begin for the second part!!
LOVE YOU MARVEL!!!

Non stop action and lots of movie fun.  Marvel raised the bar in making a fun, pulse pounding movie.  It is pretty difficult to make a movie with that many characters and sub-plots but they did it as about as best as possible.  Go see it...its fun, entertaining and more fun.
Fantastic Movie.  Worth seeing on the bid screen.  Can't  wait to see the next one.

Great culmination film of the entirety of the MCU. Goes in a completely different direction than I had expected, adds emotions as well.

Well, this movie is LIT.  It's the best in the MCU, a true masterpiece. The action scenes and battles are top notch, and Thanos is a great villain. Finally Marvel kills people, and that's what makes this movie impactful, even though it's quite obvious that not all deaths are permanent. Some critics are talking about way too many deaths etc. We are talking about the destruction of half the population in the UNIVERSE and its prevention. OBVIOUSLY there will be many deaths. Also, it's ridiculous that almost all the viewers loved the movie, yet a considerable amount of critics basically called it garbage. It focused on the right things, and was full of action and emotion. It's by far the most enjoyable marvel film ever, both plotwise and visually. The original star wars of our time.

Marvel Studios did it again, created another masterpiece. Thrill, joy, sadness and a lot of other emotions mixed in perfect balance as all things should be. Highly recommend for anyone that enjoys these type of movies. 

P.S I would give more start if there would be a potability.
One the best Marvel movie ever made! Now the russo brothers are one my favorite directors of all time!
